name: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes served with butter, maple syrup, and a side of fresh berries.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: Toasted English muffins topped with poached eggs, Canadian bacon, and creamy hollandaise sauce.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Crispy sourdough bread topped with smashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of feta cheese.

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: A hearty burrito filled with scrambled eggs, bacon, cheese, and hash browns, served with salsa.

name: French Toast
description: Thick slices of brioche dipped in egg batter, cooked to golden brown and topped with powdered sugar and syrup.

name: Omelette Deluxe
description: A fluffy three-egg omelette loaded with ham, cheese, mushrooms, peppers, and onions.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: Creamy Greek yogurt layered with granola, honey, and fresh fruit.

name: Smoked Salmon Bagel
description: A toasted bagel topped with cream cheese, smoked salmon, capers, and red onion.

name: Chicken Burger
description: A juicy grilled chicken patty topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and creamy mayo on a toasted bun.

name: Roast Beef Sandwich
description: Tender slices of roast beef piled high on fresh bread with a touch of horseradish and creamy mayo.

name: Alfredo Pizza
description: A creamy Alfredo sauce topped with mozzarella, grilled chicken, and a sprinkle of parmesan.

name: Sirloin Steak
description: A juicy and tender sirloin steak grilled to perfection, served with your choice of sides.

name: Protein Bowl
description: A healthy mix of grilled chicken, quinoa, avocado, and a variety of fresh veggies, topped with a light dressing.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy battered fish fillets served with golden fries and a side of tartar sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomato, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Tri Tip
description: Perfectly seasoned and grilled tri tip steak, served with your choice of sides and sauce.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: A perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with a lemon butter sauce and a side of seasonal vegetables.

name: Lamb Chops
description: Tender and juicy lamb chops marinated in garlic and herbs, served with creamy mashed potatoes.

name: Pasta Primavera
description: A colorful medley of fresh vegetables tossed with penne pasta in a light garlic olive oil sauce.

name: Filet Mignon
description: An 8-ounce filet mignon grilled to perfection, served with a red wine reduction and roasted asparagus.

name: Seafood Risotto
description: Creamy risotto cooked with shrimp, scallops, and mussels, seasoned with white wine and parmesan cheese.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with seasoned ground beef, rice, and cheese, baked to perfection and topped with marinara sauce.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Slow-cooked BBQ pork ribs served with coleslaw and a side of cornbread.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese, baked to golden perfection.
